中文标题：研究发现老鼠会上瘾（美联社）
中文标题描述：AP-老鼠会成为瘾君子。科学家们说，知道这一点很重要，而且需要很长时间才能证明。现在，法国和英国研究人员的两项研究表明，这些动物一旦真正上瘾，就会表现出和人们一样的对可卡因的强迫性冲动。
英文标题：Studies Find Rats Can Get Hooked on Drugs (AP)
英文标题描述：AP - Rats can become drug addicts. That's important to know, scientists say, and has taken a long time to prove. Now two studies by French and British researchers show the animals exhibit the same compulsive drive for cocaine as people do once they're truly hooked.
样本索引：104

中文标题：科技与时尚
中文标题描述：分析iPod mini在日本的成功，JapanConsuming写道，#147；事实上，iPod mini是日本市场上极为罕见的理想产品之一。这是一款做一些有用的事情的产品，做得很好，看起来也很棒。这些因素本身都不足以使iPod mini取得成功；它们的结合，通过巧妙和创造性的功能实现，才是区别所在。再加上一些久经考验的有限供应营销，一家看起来和路易威登一样好的商店，以及一场在东京以粉色、绿色和黄色覆盖数周的高影响力获奖广告活动，iPod mini现象的一些原因可以理解#148；8月10日
英文标题：Technology as Fashion
英文标题描述：Analyzing the success of the iPod mini in Japan, JapanConsuming writes,  #147;The iPod mini is in fact one of those all too rare examples of an ideal product for the Japanese market. It is a product that does something useful, does it really well, and looks terrific too. None of these factors on their own is enough to make the iPod mini a success; their combination, through deft and creative implementation of function, is what makes the difference. Add in some tried and tested limited supply marketing, a store that looks as good as Louis Vuitton and a high impact award winning advertising campaign that has covered Tokyo in pink, green and yellow for weeks, and some of the reasons for the iPod mini phenomenon can be understood. #148; Aug 10
样本索引：444

中文标题：米歇尔·贡德里的视觉世界
中文标题描述：一个月前，我被介绍给米歇尔·贡德里的作品。简而言之，我被他的短片和音乐视频所震撼和诱惑。即使你没有听说过他，你也可能在Gap的广告、各种音乐视频和最近的电影《无斑心灵的永恒阳光》中看到过他的许多作品。他的许多作品都充满了视觉元素，单从视觉元素来看，这些元素简单而平凡。然而，在他精湛的指导下，这些元素结合在一起，形成了一种极具魅力的视觉体验。他从不停止推动视觉技术，挑战我们对视觉媒介的想法。
英文标题：The Visual World of Michel Gondry
英文标题描述：A month ago I was introduced to the works of Michel Gondry.  In short, I was amazed and tantalized by his short films and music videos.  Even if you haven't heard of him, you've probably seen his many works in Gap commercials, various music videos, and the recent movie Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind.    Many of his works explode with visual elements that, when taken alone, are simple and mundane.  However, under his masterful guidance, these elements come together to form a highly mesmerizing visual experience.  He never ceases to push visual technologies and challenge our ideas about the visual medium.
样本索引：164
